divs: sighting detailsi have made many ufo reports as of the summer of 2013 so my details will be limited. since first sighting of orange fireball ufo in july, their frequency of appearance has increased. as of 10\10\13 the sighting have become almost daily. there is a group of 4 fire ball ufos that continuously appear in the sky in my area. their flight patterns and formations vary from day to day but they are without doubt some form of aircraft; their unusual flight patterns leads me to believe they are experimental\extraterrestrial in nature. tonight i witnessed what appeared to be a landing in the mountains off in the distance. the craft illuminated the ground below it, but landed below the tree line, so craft details were not visible.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
